lion_mystique.name: Lion Mystique pour Copine de Vincent
lion_mystique.prompt: legendary lion hero portrait, majestic mystical lion with glowing golden mane, shamanic totems floating around, cosmic starfield background, ancient savanna setting, piercing intelligent amber eyes, spiritual golden and purple aura, epic fantasy trading card game art, highly detailed digital painting, dramatic lighting
lion_mystique.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, amateur art, simple cartoon, childish, poorly detailed, bad anatomy, text overlays, watermarks, signatures, modern clothing unless specified, realistic photography, low resolution
lion_mystique.style_notes: Même style que URZ-KÔM mais avec lion majestueux au lieu d'ours
